"What Rangers Are All About":
"You're one of those next-generation ARKS ops, aren't
you? Well, you've got no idea how good you've got it.
I mean, you get to switch to any class you want!
Me, I'm a Wizard, and I don't have a clue as to what other
classes are about. That's why I want you to show me
how a Ranger fights. Maybe I'll learn something.

*Complete the mission as a Ranger within 3 minutes.
"

"アンタは第三世代なんでしょ？
好きなようにクラスを変更できるなんて
どれだけ恵まれてるのかしらね。

アタシはフォースだから、他のクラスの事が
さっぱりわからないのよ。
ちょっとアンタ、レンジャーで
レンジャーっぽい戦い方を見せてよ。

※レンジャー限定、3分以内にクリア"
